matrxs.grid_world.GridWorld¶

class GridWorld(shape, tick_duration, simulation_goal, run_sail_api=True, run_visualization_server=True, rnd_seed=1, visualization_bg_clr='#C2C2C2', visualization_bg_img=None, verbose=False)¶

A representation of the MATRXS world as a grid.

Methods

add_to_grid(self, grid_obj)

Add an object to the grid.

get_env_object(self, requested_id[, obj_type])

Get the object belonging to the requested id.

get_objects_in_range(self, agent_loc, …)

Get all objects of a obj type (normal objects or agent) within a certain range around the agent’s location

initialize(self)

Initializing the gridworld.

remove_from_grid(self, object_id[, …])

Remove an object from the grid :param object_id: ID of the object to remove :param remove_from_carrier: whether to also remove from agents which carry the object or not.

run(self)

Running the simulation.
__init__(self, shape, tick_duration, simulation_goal, run_sail_api=True, run_visualization_server=True, rnd_seed=1, visualization_bg_clr='#C2C2C2', visualization_bg_img=None, verbose=False)¶
